content: the collecting acorns headband features two wide cables on a reverse stockinette background the headband is knit flat the pattern is an 8-row repeat the first and last 3 stitches form an i-cord edging that makes the edges look neat and prevents them from curling the cast-on and bind-off edges are seamed together forming a decorative twist in the middle the seam is hidden by the twist and is not visible
